SHAKTI PADA AND SHAKTINI PADA WITH THE LIVE DARSHAN OF THE SUPREME PONTIFF OF HINDUISM (SPH), JAGATGURU MAHASANNIDHANAM (JGM), HIS DIVINE HOLINESS (HDH) BHAGAWAN NITHYANANDA PARAMASHIVAM.  
NITHYANANDA SATSANG 
*PARAMASHIVA’S MESSAGE DIRECTLY FROM KAILASA:
*CONSCIOUS SOVEREIGNTY BECOMES YOUR REALITY JUST BY SPENDING YOUR TIME AND SPACE TO UNDERSTAND, COGNIZE, REALISE CONSCIOUS SOVEREIGNTY.
*NO OTHER PRE-QUALIFICATION IS REQUIRED.
*YOU SPEND A LOT OF TIME AND SPACE IN FORGETTING YOUR CONSCIOUS SOVEREIGN STATE.
*THE TIME YOU SPENT TO FORGET YOUR CONSCIOUS SOVEREIGN STATE, IF IT IS 100 HOURS, NOW AT LEAST YOU NEED TO SPEND ONE HOUR, TO REMEMBER YOUR CONSCIOUS SOVEREIGNTY.
*YOU DON’T NEED TO SPEND 100 HOURS AGAIN, BECAUSE TO BRING IGNORANCE IT TAKES LOT OF TIME; TO BRING ENLIGHTENMENT IT DOESN'T TAKE MUCH TIME; IT DOESN'T TAKE THE SAME TIME.
*1000 YEARS IF YOUR ROOM WAS IN DARKNESS, YOU DON’T NEED 1000 YEARS TO LIGHT THAT ROOM, JUST ONE CANDLE IS ENOUGH, ONE LAMP IS ENOUGH, THE ROOM IS LIT.  
*SO, YOU NEED TO SPEND AT LEAST ONE PERCENT OF THE TIME, BUT YOU NEED TO SPEND TIME AND SPACE, BE VERY CLEAR.
*LISTEN CAREFULLY.  WITH WHATEVER YOU SPEND TIME, THAT WILL BECOME PART OF YOU. 
*FOR EXAMPLE, IF I WAS SITTING IN INDIA AND SPENDING TIME WAGING A STUPID WAR IMPOSED ON ME BY THESE YELLOW JOURNALISTS...ACTUALLY IN INDIA, YELLOW JOURNALISTS RUN PORNOGRAPHY AND VIOLENCE MIXED IN HIGH DOSAGE AND USE CELEBRITIES AS THE CHARACTERS, AND SELL PORNOGRAPHY MATERIAL TO COMMON MASS, AND KEEP COMMON THE MASS IN A VERY CHEAP, LOW STANDARD OF MENTALITY, THAT’S ALL. 
*SO IF I SPENT MY TIME AND SPACE WAGING WAR WITH THEM, BY THE TIME I AM FIFTY, EVEN IF I WIN THE WAR WITH THEM, THE PURPOSE OF MY LIFE WOULD HAVE BEEN DEFEATED, BECAUSE I SPENT ALL MY TIME ON A STUPID WAR FORCED ON ME BY STUPID PEOPLE!
*AND IF I WAS THERE IN INDIA, THEY WOULD HAVE KILLED ME BY NOW, EITHER THROUGH MOB LYNCHING OR SOMETHING ELSE. 
*THERE ARE SO MANY METHODOLOGIES, THEY HAVE CLEAR TOOL KITS FOR HOW TO DO THIS MOB LYNCHING, LIKE HOW THEY HAVE DONE TO THE JUNA AKHADA SADHUS - ONE SADHU AND HIS ASSISTANT IN MAHARASHTRA OR MADHYA PRADESH, HOW THEY HAVE BEEN MURDERED.
*FIRST THEY TOLD THAT THESE SADHUS ARE CHILD KIDNAPPERS. THEY SPREAD THE LIES AND FALSE INFORMATION AND KILLED THEM.
*FORTUNATELY, WE KNOW THEIR IDENTITY AND THEY ARE FROM A WELL KNOWN AKHADA AND THEY ARE MAHANTS, AND THEY HAVE COME JUST THEN TO THAT AREA. THEY WERE ACTUALLY CROSSING. SO ALL THAT INFORMATION WAS AVAILABLE INCLUDING THE VIDEO OF THE POLICE HANDING THEM OVER TO THE CRIMINALS FOR MURDER IN PALGAR DISTRICT, MAHARASHTRA.
*SO, BECAUSE WE GOT SO MUCH OF EVIDENCE, WE WERE ABLE TO PROVE THAT IT IS MOB LYNCHING.
*SO, IN THIS INCIDENT, THE HINDU-PHOBIC TERRORISTS FAILED. 
*INVESTIGATION REVEALED THE TRUTH. BUT THEY HAVE A TOOLKIT, A VERY ORGANIZED TOOLKIT, HOW TO MAKE SOMEBODY LOOK ANTISOCIAL AND THEN TAKE THE LAW IN THEIR HAND AND KILL.
*SURELY IF I WAS IN INDIA, I WOULD NOT HAVE BEEN ALLOWED EVEN TO LIVE, THAT’S THE ULTIMATE TRUTH, THE WAY IT IS GOING ON, EVEN NOW.
*HINDUISM HAS MULTIPLE VERSIONS IN THE MODERN DAY - THE CHRISTIANISED VERSION, ISLAMIZED VERSION, WESTERNIZED VERSION, THE MATERIALISTIC VERSION.
*ANYONE WHO REVIVES THE ORIGINAL INDIGENOUS, ANCIENT, AUTHENTIC, ENLIGHTENMENT-CENTRIC VERSION OF HINDUISM, THEY ARE ELIMINATED, BECAUSE THEY ARE THE THREAT FOR PEOPLE WHO ARE TRYING TO DILUTE HINDUISM BY CHRISTIANIZING IT, WESTERNIZING IT, MODERNIZING IT, USING IT FOR POLITICAL PURPOSE, POLITICAL ADVANTAGES, MATERIALISTIC ADVANTAGES... ALL THOSE VESTED INTERESTS.
*PEOPLE WHO ARE INTERESTED IN HINDUISM FOR ANY REASON OTHER THAN HINDUISM ITSELF, FOR ALL OF THEM, THESE INDIGENOUS HINDU ENLIGHTENED MASTERS ARE THE THREAT.
